mainText:
I am typing on a Mac, with one beside me as well. I have them in other 
rooms and in the attic. Big and small, new and old. Thanks for providing 
for those who think differently - even after everyone else seems to 
agree. Beauty, design, engineering and flair.
I am sad. Thank you.
I pray for comfort for your family and that those you have inspired will 
continue to innovate.
My condolences and thanks.
author: Kevin
